title: Scallion Pancake
directions: In small bowl, whisk together soy sauce, rice vinegar, chili paste, and sugar; stir in ginger and set aside.

On cutting board, place 1 dumpling wrapper. Light brush top with sesame oil and scatter 2 tsp scallions on top. Top with second dumpling wrapper, pressing to adhere. Repeat with sesame oil, scallions, and wrappers until you have a stack of 6 wrappers. Repeat with remaining ingredients to make a total of 8 stacks of 6 wrappers each.

Heat 1 Tbsp canola oil in medium skillet on medium. Cook 1 pancake at a time until golden brown, 1 to 2 minutes per side. Repeat with remaining oil and pancake stacks. Serve sprinkled with any remaining scallions and with ginger-chili sauce for dipping.
ingredients: 1 2-inch piece fresh ginger, peeled and cut into matchsticks
